notes.text: We've improved the grouping of messages in the message view and the message dialog
: We now display the correct title of an object page after an error was caused by a field for which a side effect is configured
: The counter in the message button now adds up all messages, and inherits the icon and semantic color of the highest severity type
We now provide an option to display a custom message in the message strip above the list report table
We now correctly set the focus on the field that corresponds to the message used in the messageButton menu
When navigating to an ObjectPage that has LongRunners requests, we now ensure that no data from previous contexts is displayed
